result.execSummary:
The defendant Manuel Ramirez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to any previously imposed sentence.  Credit for 394 days.

superMiscConds.notes: The Court ordered that all court costs, fines, restitution and surcharges be paid through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of extended supervision.   Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 423, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

No unsupervised contact with unrelated persons under the age of 18.

No contact with victim.

Complete compas assessment,  counseling, evaluations, programs and assessments as appropriate and followup.

Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections and follow rules of supervision.

Submit DNA sample.

Comply with Sex Offender Registry Program under 301.45, Wis. Stats. (LIFE TIME)

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
